content: this sweater is knit seamlessly from the top down ▲ sizes 6 12 24 months finished chest circumference 19 20 5 22 ▲ yarn madelinetosh tosh dk 100% superwash merino 115g / 225 yds 1 2 2 skeins for short sleeves 2 2 3 skeins for long sleeves ▲ notions stitch markers removeable stitch markers stitch holders tapestry needle ▲ needles us size 4 3 5 mm set of dpns us size 6 4 mm set of dpns 16 circular or size to obtain gauge ▲ gauge 21 sts x 28 row = 4 in stockinette stitch using larger needle
